title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Transition altitudes in MSFS
description:
In this video we will have a look at what transition altitudes are and how they are related to the altimeter/barometric settings. In this case we are using the CJ4 as the aircraft to explain how to change the transition altitude and show the effect on the barometric settings.

More information can be found on the sites below:

What You Need To Know About Transition Altitudes
https://www.boldmethod.com/learn-to-fly/airspace/transition-altitudes/

What Is MSL in Aviation?
https://www.flyingmag.com/guides/what-is-msl-aviation/
